item.minecraft.armor_stand.description: Use [%s] + [%s] with an empty hand to open configuration screen.
puzzlesapi.screen.alignments.block.descr: Align an armor stand placed on a surface so that a block held by it appears on the surface.
puzzlesapi.screen.alignments.itemFlat.de: Align an armor stand placed on a surface so that a non-tool item held by it appears flat on the surface.
puzzlesapi.screen.alignments.itemFloatin: Align an armor stand placed on a surface so that an item held by it appears upright on the surface.
puzzlesapi.screen.alignments.tool.descri: Align an armor stand placed on a surface so that a tool held by it appears flat on the surface.
puzzlesapi.screen.centered.description: Align an armor stand in the center of the block position it is placed on.
puzzlesapi.screen.cornered.description: Align an armor stand at the corner of the block position it is placed on.
puzzlesapi.screen.credits: Some content on this page originates from the Vanilla Tweaks "Armor Statues" data pack. Click this button to go to their website!
puzzlesapi.screen.rotations.pose.head: Head
puzzlesapi.screen.rotations.tip1: Hold any [§dShift§r] or [§dAlt§r] key to lock two-dimensional sliders to a single axis while dragging!
puzzlesapi.screen.rotations.tip2: Use arrow keys to move sliders with greater precision than when dragging! Focus a slider first by clicking.
puzzlesapi.screen.style.invisible.descri: Makes the statue itself invisible, but still shows all equipped items.
puzzlesapi.screen.style.name: Set a name to display above the entity if enabled.
puzzlesapi.screen.style.noBasePlate.desc: Hide the stone base plate at the statue's feet.
puzzlesapi.screen.style.noGravity.descri: Prevents the statue from falling down, so it may float freely.
puzzlesapi.screen.style.sealed.descripti: The statue can no longer be broken, equipment cannot be changed. Disallows opening this menu in survival mode.
puzzlesapi.screen.style.showArms.descrip: Shows the statue's arms, so it may hold items in both hands.
puzzlesapi.screen.style.showName.descrip: Render the statue's name tag above it's head.
puzzlesapi.screen.style.small.descriptio: Makes the statue half it's size like a baby mob.
